class="description">  在 CNET.COM 中，jetAudio 是 Windows 評價最高與下載次數最多的媒體播放器。然而，您現在也可以在 Android 行動裝置中使用 jetAudio 聆聽到同樣高品質的聲音了。<p>幾乎所有類型的數碼音樂檔案都可以播放 (副檔名 .wav .mp3 .ogg .flac .m4a .mpc .tta .wv .ape .mod .spx .wma*格式) 並提供了高品質聲音、各種音效和其它增強功能，比如擴音、X-低音、迴聲。</p><p>音效設定內建 32 種等化器預設值，可提供各式各樣的聆聽體驗。<br>對於想要訂製屬於自己的音樂體驗，它能讓您使用 10 段與 20 段的圖形等化器與其它先進的播放功能，包括播放轉速控制、淡出淡入、AGC 等其它功能。</p><p>Basic 版本除了有廣告和部分限制功能外，提供了與 Plus 版本相同的功能。<br>要享受全功能版本的 jetAudio，請購買 Plus 版本。</p><p>-- Sound effects plugins --<br>* AM3D Audio Enhancer (http://www.am3d.com)<br>* Bongiovi DPS (http://www.bongioviacoustics.com)<br>(Sound effect plugins will be sold separately through in-app purchase.)<br>(Some plugins can be purchased in Plus version only.)</p><p>-- 限定於 Plus 版本功能 --<br>* 20 波段圖形等化器<br>* 標籤顯示歌詞（非同步歌詞）<br>* 2 款螢幕鎖<br>* 14 種尺寸 App 小工具：4x1 (#2), 4x2 (#3), 4x3 (#3), 4x4 (#3), 3x3, 2x2, 2x3<br>* 音調轉換器<br>* Last.fm（需要官方 Last.fm 應用程式）<br>* 準確的播放速度控制（50% ~ 200%）<br>* 瀏覽器淺灰色與白色主題（Plus 版）<br>* 歌手/歌曲/資料夾/曲風瀏覽器唱片櫃模式<br>* 調整快進與倒帶間隔時間<br>* 擴充式通知列（JB 系統）<br>* MIDI 錄放（使用 JetAudio 波表 MIDI 合成器引擎）</p><p>-- Basic 與 Plus 版功能 --<br>* 可以選擇清單或 10 格唱片櫃模式的版面風格<br>* X-擴音, 迴聲, X-低音等聲音效果<br>* AGC（自動增益控制），以避免音軌之間的音量波動<br>* 從 50% 到 200% 的轉速控制（音調調整）<br>* 交叉淡出淡入，無縫播放<br>* 淡入淡出 <br>* 透過歌手，專輯，歌曲，播放清單，曲風及資料夾的瀏覽器來播放音樂<br>* 聲道平衡/音量控制<br>* 休眠定時器長達 24 小時<br>* 快速滑動手指來發佈您想要在 Facebook/Twitter 上聆聽到什麼好音樂<br>* 向下滑動顯示現正播放<br>* 滑動左/右播放下一首/上一首<br>* 螢幕鎖<br>* 重新播放 A&lt;-&gt;B<br>* 耳機按鍵控制<br>   - 按暫停/重新開始<br>   - 按兩次/三次按鍵控制播放下一首/上一首<br>   - 長按靜音或 TTS（時間，標題）<br>*多選功能（刪除/新增至播放清單）<br>*維持螢幕開啟，鎖定方向選項<br>*搖晃播放下一首/上一首曲目<br>*支援格式：<br>  MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, M4A, MPC, TTA, WV, APE, MOD (模組格式 S3M, IT), SPX, AIFF<br>（WMA 可能不支援在某些裝置上，請檢查您的裝置規格是否支援 WMA）</p><p>（如果想要新增您當地的語言，請來信至 jetaudio@jetappfactory.com 正體中文 撰寫 陳必嶽 原音錄音機提供簡易的介面，讓用戶能夠錄製高品質(未壓縮或MP3)的錄音。原音錄音機並沒有做任何的時間長度的限制，它能一直錄音錄到您的儲存空間不夠為止。<p>即時錄播功能是在連結耳機的情況下，能夠讓您邊錄邊聽的功能。這個功能只有在連結耳機且按下新增按鈕後才會出現。</p><p>所有的檔案會被儲存在手機儲存空間的 VoiceRecorder 資料夾(如果您只有 SD 卡，它會被儲存在 SD 卡)中: /mnt/sdcard/VoiceRecorder</p><p>MP3 即時壓縮支援多數手機，低階手機會採用階段式轉檔。</p><p>支援 miidio Space，它是一個錄音分享的網路服務，您可以使用它來將錄音網址(該網址由 miidio Space 產生)分享到 Fcebook, twitter, Google+,...。您可以在設定畫面中開啟這項服務，開啟後，miidio Recorder 會使用 Facebook 帳號來進行身份驗證，以為您建立專屬的分享網址。請注意，miidio 不會在沒取得您的同意的情況下，發佈任何訊息到您的 Facebook 頁面。</p><p>您可以在者頁上加入 miidio 全新製作的 Recorder Widget 來加速錄音的程序，您只需要按下 Recorder Widget 的任何地方，就能開始或停止錄音。 </p><p><br>功能清單:</p><p>*. 錄音功能: Wave, MP3<br>*. 播放錄音功能: Wave, MP3<br>*. 檔案清單操作功能<br>*. 檔案分享功能<br>*. 批次檔案刪除<br>*. 多重頁面操作介面<br>*. 錄音設定成鈴聲<br>*. 即時錄播功能<br>*. 日文翻譯<br>*. Notification icon<br>*. 檔案資訊編輯器<br>*. 檔案標籤<br>*. 設定頁面<br>*. 更豐富的介面<br>*. Recorder Widget</p><p>權限說明︰</p><p>儲存: 用來將錄音寫入到儲存空間中<br>硬體控制-錄制音訊: 錄音<br>系統工具-防止手機進入待命狀態: 在螢幕變暗後，能持續錄音<br>檢查網路狀態: 廣告<br>網路通訊: 廣告</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span <div class="description">  讓音樂像朋友一樣,陪伴你24小時不打烊! <br>★依不同時間的情境,播放最match的音樂!<br>★搭配可愛輕鬆小動畫,共同營造各時態的幸福時刻!<br>★風潮音樂全系列目錄,查詢音樂最方便!<br>*此服務以線上串流聆聽，須在有網路的環境下使用。<br>*目前本程式僅開放320x480、480x800、540x960以及1280x720等四種解析度使用，其他解析度尚在研測中，造成不便敬請見諒！ <p>工作時卻想睡覺的時候,就需要聽一些振奮精神的音樂;早晨起床的時候,就想聽一些清爽怡人、給人陽光、希望的音樂;睡覺前,可以聽一些放鬆紓解疲勞的音樂。</p><p>「24hr音樂時鐘」就像一個智慧型電台,將一天24小時, 從「天亮說早安」到「王子公主夜未眠」等,劃分為十個時段, 在不同的時間, 播放多首合適當時段的情境音樂, 讓舒緩旋律放鬆你焦慮的心靈, 讓輕快節奏加強你的工作效率, 再搭配十段不同情境的輕鬆動畫, 讓聽覺結合視覺, 共同營造各時態的幸福時刻。</p><p>除了24小時不打烊的「24hr音樂時鐘」功能外,使用者還可以在聽到喜歡的音樂時,隨時將曲目加入「我的最愛」,或者透過完整的風潮音樂目錄─「音樂選單」,從「心靈」、「演奏」、「輕音樂」等分類挑選出喜歡的歌曲加入「我的最愛」,打造個人專屬的心情電台。</p><p>*加入FUN數位@風潮音樂Facebook粉絲專頁, class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.zodinplex.lullaby.sleep.babies" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.zodinplex.lullaby.sleep.babies" title="催眠曲嬰兒"> 309.    催眠曲嬰兒  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Zodinplex" title="Zodinplex">Zodinplex</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.zodinplex.lullaby.sleep.babies"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKImNvbS56b2RpbnBsZXgubHVsbGFieS5zbGVlcC5iYWJpZXMQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  我們中的許多人，很懷念那些時候，我們的母親安慰我們睡一個熟悉的歌曲或兩年。現在，作為成年人，我們經常發現自己需要為我們自己的小傢伙們舒緩睡前催眠曲，但有時名稱，甚至歌詞蒙蔽我們。<p>聽起來，以幫助你入睡！聲音放鬆！為兒童和成年人的聲音！天籟！嬰兒和家長的音樂盒！</p><p>無論在這個星球上，或在哪一年出生的地方，你的母親唱你把你睡覺前的催眠曲。搖籃曲整個人類歷史上已經存在，我們唱這一天的，有些是幾百歲。雖然沒有一個是肯定的，它被認為“搖籃曲”的名稱從“平靜”的“聲音”的一個幫助寶寶入睡。其他人則認為，長期來，從希伯萊語，“莉莉絲的阿比”，意思是“莉莉絲走開。”莉莉絲是一個民俗的字符被認為偷孩子在夜間和這些咒語響起來保持她走。<br>以下是一些流行的搖籃曲和他們的起源。</p><p>特點：<br> - 安裝到SD卡上的“搖籃曲”<br> -  5個不同的催眠曲睡眠聽起來<br> - 可能的催眠曲的音樂設置為鈴聲<br> - 盡可能催眠曲嬰兒歌曲作為報警<br> - 定時器睡眠的聲音<br> - 漂亮的壁紙<br> - 冥想搖籃曲音樂在後台運行<br> - 放寬對兒童的大腦<br> - 只為孩子們優良的品質自然睡眠聽起來<br> - 放鬆的旋律樣本<br> - 最好的催眠曲兒童音樂（孩子的歌曲，音樂新生嬰兒的聲音）<br> - 自然噪音製造者</p><p>這個應用程序有：</p><p>+只有自然的兒童歌曲音樂<br>+放鬆和睡眠的聲音！<br>+高品質的舒緩的音樂<br>+最好的搖籃曲的孩子，嬰兒，兒童，嬰兒，新生兒<br>+催眠曲鈴聲和搖籃曲歌詞<br>+舒緩的音樂 - 睡眠的聲音<br>絕對輕鬆的聲音入睡<br>+美妙的嬰兒歌曲（孩子的歌曲）<br>+白噪聲嬰兒睡眠<br>+音樂療法（音樂療法，聲音療法，治療的旋律）<br>+最好的質量好新生嬰兒的聲音<br>+中，你會放鬆，像嬰兒睡覺<br>+兒童立即入睡<br>搖籃曲的性質（嬰兒睡眠）<br>+兒童歌曲深度放鬆<br>+寶寶的聲音入睡<br>+嬰兒音樂器樂搖籃曲<br>+最好的寶寶睡前音樂盒</p><p>睡前歌和搖籃曲：孩子臨睡前的放鬆，舒緩的歌曲。</p><p>搖籃曲是一個舒緩的歌曲，通常唱的才去睡覺，以加快這一進程的意圖，幼童。因此，他們往往是簡單和重複。可以發現在每一種文化，自遠古時期的搖籃曲。</p><p>音樂療法（自然聲音療法，放鬆和睡眠的聲音，舒緩的音樂，放鬆的聲音，冥想音樂）是一個專職醫療界和表現療法之一，包括人與人之間的過程，在其中一個受過訓練的音樂治療師利用音樂來幫助客戶改善或維持他們的健康。</p><p>作為微小的生命，嬰兒需要相當多的事情需要人類的平均，但在較小的部分，或在不同的波長。例如，陽光......這不，太陽會殺死一個嬰兒，但如果暴露超過一定金額，也可能是有害的童工。所以音樂流派和數量上，一個普通的人可能考慮舒緩或放鬆，實際上可能是多一個孩子可以處理。</p><p>經常唱催眠曲是在平靜的兒童家長，讓他們睡覺，或者乾脆花時間與他們。簡單的歌詞，自然，搖籃曲故事情節通常用於兒童，因此適合他們。一位家長可以動搖一個孩子睡前，平靜，再見，平息不滿的孩子，或與小時候玩上口。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> 版本更新:  <br>a).播放效能優化<br>b).其他已知問題修正</p><p><br>◎ 小叮嚀: <br>a) 建議使用Android 3.0以上版本。 <br>b) 使用3G網路的用戶:為避免3G網路在移動中的傳輸不穩定影響您聽歌,建議您多多使用離線歌曲將常聽的歌曲下載到裝置內方便聆聽。<br>c) 因音樂版權因素,myMusic音樂服務僅適用於台澎金馬地區使用,在此地區以外地區使用將會無法正常提供服務。 </p><p>◎ 還不是myMusic會員? 沒關係,馬上先體驗吧!更多關於 myMusic服務,歡迎至官網http://www.mymusic.net.tw<br>◎ data-cover-large="https://lh6.ggpht.com/DQV0Hd2eSGZLwDhYqOH734nMePuj9_v99Ly__bgJtd2fyvCKyH9LPYW1e2r3wTabyoaB=w340-rw" class="preordered-label">已預購</span> </span> <span class="preview-overlay-container" data-docid="com.ginkgosoft.dlna.ctrl">  </span>  </a>  </div> <div class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ginkgosoft.dlna.ctrl" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ginkgosoft.dlna.ctrl" title="DLNA Player"> 323.    DLNA Player  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=ginkgosoft" title="ginkgosoft">ginkgosoft</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.ginkgosoft.dlna.ctrl"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5naW5rZ29zb2Z0LmRsbmEuY3RybBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  DLNA is a standard to facilitate access to multimedia content between devices connected within the same computer network. <br>For more information about DLNA, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_Living_Network_Alliance.<p>Ginkgo DLNA / uPnP Player acts as Media Player or Media Controller, allows you to find media  from <br>Media Servers (Windows PC, NAS with DNLA server installed, etc.) in your home network, and play to <br>Media Renderer(network player, smart TV, etc.)  or locally on your android device.</p><p>================<br>Main features:<br>================<br>[Zero configuration]:  Thanks to DLNA, compatible devices are discovered automatically. No configuration is needed.</p><p>[Library browsing] : User friendly UI to browse you media library with deep structure.</p><p>[Favorites] :  Supports favorites folders and medias, allows finding frequently played medias quickly.</p><p>[History] :  Recently played medias are kept in history.</p><p>[Play to remote renderer]:  Used as remote control for your renderer, plays media to Media Renderer. </p><p>[Play music on phone] :  Built-in audio renderer based on Android media facilities,  commonly supported audio <br>format include .mp3.mp4 .mpa .flac .ogg. .mkv .wav. 3gp. <br>(For more details : http://developer.android.com/guide/appendix/media-formats.html)</p><p>[Built-in image viewer] :  Built-in image viewer  with zoomer to visualize your photos.</p><p>[Play with external app] :  <br>video medias are forwarded to other player  installed on your phone. (e.g. "MX Player", “VPlayer” )</p><p><br>================<br>Known DLNA issue<br>================<br>[Media formats]: Media Renderers may support from extensive to limited media formats. Take this into <br>consideration when choosing your media renderer.  Media servers supporting “transcoding” could be a solution<br>if the renderer supports limited formats.</p><p>[Not supported operations]: Some Media Renderers have limited support of DLNA operations. Common issues include : <br>1.  SEEK, PAUSE, SET VOLUMN not supported.  <br>2.No finish signal sent when current track ended(So no continue play support by Ginkgo DLNA player).</p><p>[Media information] : DLNA allows  Media Servers providing optional information for medias. This include <br>encoding, size/duration artist, album, album art, etc. Most media servers do a good job, but some do  just the <br>minimum. Consider changing media server if you want more media information.</p><p>[Protocol Message Error ]: DLNA compatible devices communicate each other by protocol messages. Some <br>media servers may send sometimes malformed messages that cannot be properly handled be others. This may <br>lead to loss of information or application crash.</p><p>================<br>Note:<br>================<br>This application is in beta test phase. Your feedbacks on application bugs, device compatibility issues are welcome.<br>For the purpose of improving the quality, this application send  anonymous crash reports and usage information.<br>This application is not certified by Digital Living Network Alliance.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ginkgosoft.dlna.ctrl" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ginkgosoft.dlna.ctrl" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 3.7 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 74.26285743713379%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.ginkgosoft.dlna.ctrl"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy <br>儘管我們生活在21世紀，沒有什麼錯與具有老式電話rings.When你提到的舊手機，每個人都記得過去的美好時光，因此單曲難怪這些鈴聲Android手機其實都是復古的鈴聲。設置這些免費鈴聲作為來電鈴聲或作為報文的聲音，甚至更好，作為報警。設置定時器和其他通知聲音，或者通過社交網絡或電子郵件發送份額老式電話的鈴聲。 <br>&nbsp;這是不久前，當我們都有了旋轉手機，它是更高階層的象徵。這些都是其他時間後跟經典的手機，所以通過下載這個Android應用程序，你可以有貝爾電話，仿古電話鈴響，雙貝爾和更多的聲音。 <br>免費舊手機鈴聲似乎是炫耀你的手機的最佳方式。在Android中的當今時代，我們有很多不同旋律的聲音，但鈴聲的舊手機會勾起許多寶貴的回憶。 <br>經典的鈴聲是完美的，誰想要喚起的古董手機鈴聲懷舊的回憶。如果你想要一個舊手機鈴聲把你下來的記憶裡，我們正在把鈴聲免費下載。找到自己喜歡的最好的鈴聲集合中，不要錯過任何一個電話再次。 <p>特色功能： <br>- 設置為鈴聲，分配給聯繫人 <br>- 設置為鬧鈴和計時器的聲音 <br>- 設置為短信鈴聲 <br>- 設置為小工具 <br>- 在社交網絡或電子郵件分享的聲音 <br>- 這個程序被翻譯成 English, Français, Deutsch, Italiano, Español, Português, Русский, Polski, Svenska, Srpski, Türkçe, 汉语/漢語, عربي, Bahasa Indonesia, 日本語, 한국어,  ภาษาไทย, Ελληνικά.</p><p>這個程序是測試在許多智能手機和平板電腦 HTC ( x0.5 - x2.0 )<br>8。噪聲抑制 - Noise Suppression (NS)<br>9。更改語言。<br>10。記錄在後台，即使手機處於鎖定狀態<br>11。麥克風類型可選<br>12。音頻效果<br>- Bass Boost, Equalizer, Reverb<br>13。分享您的錄音 (via SNS)<br>14。一個易於使用的和用戶友好的用戶界面錄音機<br>15。在錄製過程中剩餘錄音時間顯示<br>16。安全自動終止通過檢查設備的各種情況<br>- low SD Card memory, low battery<br>17。方便的文件管理<br>18。錄音存儲在SD卡上<br>      - in folder: (SDCard)/SoomSoft/DaRecorder/</p><p>[支持t]<br>  如果您有關於功能的意見，bug報告，故障報告和任何其他問題，請隨時通過電子郵件與我們聯繫。<br>  e-mail: SoomSoft@SoomSoft.com</p><p><br>DaRecorder is a pretty and easy-to-use multipurpose recorder made for recording in various environments.<br>DaRecorder is suitable for recording a variety of sounds such as personal voice, meeting, lecture, sermon, rendition, concert and music. <br>The use of MP3, FLAC and Ogg Vorbis makes it possible to record without losing sound quality with reduced capacity.<br>If you want clear sound quality and efficient compression, please choose this DaRecorder. </p><p>Although some functions are limited, it is advertising-free.</p><p>[Main Features]<br>  1. Widget<br>    - You can change widget icons.<br>  5. Stealth, spy, secret recording (secret recorder)<br>    - Recording can be hidden.<br>  6. Noise Suppression (NS)<br>  7. You can change language.<br>  8. Automatic timer recording<br>    - When the specified time is elapsed, recording will begin automatically.<br>  9. Set recording duration.<br>  10. Record in background even when the phone is locked.  <br>  11. Selectable microphone type.<br>  12. Audio Effects<br>     - Bass Boost, Equalizer, Reverb<br>  13. Share your recordings (via SNS)<br>  14. The use of FLAC(Lossless Compression) makes it possible to reduce file capacity by 50 - 60 % while preserving sound quality at the same level of original sound.<br>  15. The use of Variable bitrate (VBR) of MP3 and Ogg Vorbis makes it possible to regulate the capacity effectively and to reduce the loss of sound quality. <br>  16. Real-time computing remaining recording time display during recording.<br>  17. Unlimited recording time within the limits of storage space.<br>  18. Safety automatic termination by checking various situations of device.<br>      - low SD Card memory, low battery<br>  19. Convenient file management<br>  20. Recorded file is played on the default media player.<br>  21. Recordings are stored on the SD card.<br>      - in folder: (SDCard)/SoomSoft/DaRecorder/<br>  22. High Quality recorder supporting MP3, FLAC and Ogg Vorbis<br>      - Free Recorder, DaRec, DaRecorder, Sound Recorder, Audio Recorder, Secret recorder, Spy recorder, Stealth recorder</p><p>[Support]<br>  If you have an opinion on functions, bug report, trouble report and any other questions, please feel free to contact us by e-mail.<br>  We will solve the problems and <p>如果你計劃一個親密的慶祝活動，你應該有浪漫的歌曲，使事情完美。你需要浪漫的愛情鈴聲添加到您的浪漫歌曲集？看看這個音樂程序，並發現浪漫的音樂，將每一刻香料！ </p><p>每一天都是特別的，當你有一個人來愛，關心，為什麼不使它充滿了浪漫與我們浪漫的音樂？浪漫的愛情是只為勇敢所以加入我們的酷鈴聲這個浪漫的旅程。 </p><p><br>特色功能： <br>- 設置為鈴聲，分配給聯繫人 <br>- 設置為鬧鈴和計時器的聲音 <br>- 設置為短信鈴聲 <br>- 設置為小工具 <br>- 在社交網絡或電子郵件分享的聲音 <br>- 這個程序被翻譯成 Music亦是利用手机自带的扫描器。所以各位爱好者可能会遇到各种各样诡异的问题，我们都有尝试去解决，可是世界上有上万种安卓设备，有些设备我们买都买不到，更不用说测试和解决问题了。<br>中文评论中有很多人在谩骂，甚至爆粗口，作为中文开发者真的很心寒，有问题可以描述问题，发邮件反馈，让我们尝试解决，有些无法解决的问题是大家都没有办法的事情。比如这次Google开始在4.4.2以后禁止app修改SD卡上的文件。有这么多方式可以去让产品更好一些，为什么要用粗口的方式来表达自己的情绪，真是不堪入目。<br>免费版本上万行代码，只比pro版本少一个全扫描功能。可以说这个软件几乎是不以营利为目的了。广告收入也就能养活一个开发人员来维护产品。<br>我们对它投入人力，进行升级，大改造，是不得不去适应Google的改变，否则新发布的手机都无法正常使用。<br>如果真的有这么多中文用户对它不满意，我们会选择停止该产品的中文支持和后续开发。何必做吃力不讨好的事情呢？</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> ID3Fixer 批次修復音樂亂碼  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Jones+Chi" title="Jones Chi">Jones Chi</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.yschi.ID3Fixer"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEmNvbS55c2NoaS5JRDNGaXhlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ID3Fixer可以幫助你修復ID3標籤,試用於歌曲資訊亂碼的使用者.<br>支援兩種模式:<br>1. 永久修復音樂檔案中的標籤.(建議使用此模式)<br>2. 只修復Android內建資料庫, 不會修改音樂檔案.<p>ID3Fixer可以批次修改多個檔案,快速修復你的音樂資料庫亂碼,ID3Fixer根據使用者指定的編碼來讀取檔案中的ID3/MP4/WMA標籤(包含歌手名稱,專輯名稱,歌名等等),以修復系統中出現亂碼的歌曲資訊,並可以在真正套用前事先預覽標籤結果,避免出現錯誤.<br>正式支援根據資料夾選取音樂.</p><p>如果你發現有些檔案無法修復, 請寄一些範例檔案給我, 我會盡快修復些問題, 謝謝.</p><p>p.s. 如果修復音樂檔案中的標籤沒有作用, 並且無任何錯誤訊息, 那可能代表你的裝置不支援讀取Unicode標籤.</p><p>ID3Fixer支援ID3v1,ID3v2和WMA標籤.</p><p>目前支援的編碼有: 英文,繁體中文,簡體中文,日文,韓文,東歐語系, 斯拉夫語系,西歐語系,希臘文,土耳其文,希伯來文,阿拉伯文,波羅的海語系,越文,南歐語系,泰文,俄文,萬國碼.</p><p>新增Hebrew翻譯, 感謝aviel ghermezian以及他的團隊.</p><p>支援多國語言: 英文,簡體中文,繁體中文, 希伯來文.</p><p>Tag: id3, tag, music, mp3, wma, covert to 僅提供搜尋結果，不會上傳任何音樂、影片，也不提供任何音樂、影片下載，更不會鼓勵他人自行上傳音樂、影片，所有音樂、影片僅供網絡測試，個人影視製作的學習，交流之用。本 App 不製播、不下載、不發布、不更改、不儲存任何音樂、影片，所有內容均由網友自行發佈，本 App 不承擔網友託管在第三方網站的內容之責任，版權均為原唱片公司所有，請各位多多至唱片行購買唱片。<br>本 App 內之所有音樂、影片之著作權皆為原創作人所擁有，請勿複製使用，以免侵犯第三人權益，內容若有不妥，或是部分內容侵犯了您的合法權益，請洽Youtube官網或聯繫本站。</p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.bj4.u2bplayer" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.neutroncode.mpeval" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.neutroncode.mpeval" title="Neutron Music Player (Eval)"> 354.    Neutron Music Player (Eval)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Neutron+Code+Limited" title="Neutron Code Limited">Neutron Code Limited</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.neutroncode.mpeval"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5uZXV0cm9uY29kZS5tcGV2YWwQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Neutron is the professional music player with a high quality 32/64-bit audio rendering engine which provides the best possible sound quality on an Android device.<p>Neutron features a sophisticated UI with advanced controls for music playback along with high quality implementation of Parametric EQ, Surround, Crossfeed and other digital sound effects. It can play music from almost any source including network devices with SMB/CIFS or UPnP/DLNA® support.</p><p>Neutron is developed for audiophiles and those who really in love with music. Consider using Hi-Fi/Hi-End audio hardware for best results.</p><p>Get used to Neutron and have full control over your media library and sound!</p><p>FEATURES:<br> <br>* 32/64-bit audio processing (high quality HD audio).<br>* OS independent decoding and audio processing.<br>* Audio formats: MP1, MP2, MP3, OGG (Vorbis), FLAC, WMA, WMA Lossless (16-bit), AC3, AAC, M4A, M4B, M4R, MP4, 3GP, 3G2, MOV, ALAC, APE (Monkey's Audio), WV (WavPack), MPC (MusePack), WAV, AU, AIFF, MPG/MPEG (audio), AVI (audio), iTunes/Windows Media (non DRM), OPUS, DSD.<br>* Module music formats: MOD, IM, XM, S3M.<br>* Voice audio format: SPEEX.<br>* Playlists: CUE, M3U, PLS, ASX, RAM, XSPF, WPL.<br>* CUE Sheet (.CUE files, metadata).<br>* Lyrics (.LRC files, metadata).<br>* Streaming audio (plays Internet Radio streams, supports metadata).<br>* Use Network device (NAS, PC, ...) with SMB/CIFS as music source.<br>* Use FTP server as music source.<br>* Use UPnP/DLNA® compatible device as music source.<br>* Manage files of a music source via local FTP server.<br>* Output audio to UPnP/DLNA® compatible devices at up to 24-bit/192 kHz resolution.<br>* 32-bit output on Android 5.0+.<br>* Parametric equalizer DSP (4 bands).<br>* Surround sound DSP (Ambiophonic R.A.C.E.).<br>* Crossfeed DSP (for better stereo in headphones).<br>* Rumble Filter DSP (speaker overloading protection).<br>* Dithering DSP (minimize quantization).<br>* Pitch and Tempo DSP (playback speed and pitch correction).<br>* Normalization (best Preamp gain calculation after DSP effects).<br>* Replay Gain.<br>* Gapless playback.<br>* Hardware and Preamp volume controls.<br>* Crossfading.<br>* Phase inversion.<br>* High quality real-time resampling (when required): quality, audiophile.<br>* Balance.<br>* Mixing to Mono.<br>* Playback modes: shuffle, looped, single track, queue.<br>* Playlist management.<br>* Media library grouping by: album, artist, composer, genre, year, rating, folder.<br>* Artist grouping by 'Album Artist' category.<br>* Folder mode.<br>* Unicode metadata support.<br>* Real-time spectrum and RMS analyzers.<br>* Clock mode.<br>* Sleep timer.<br>* Wake timer.<br>* Interface languages: Русский, 中文 (繁体), 中文 (简体), 한국어, 日本語, Việt, ไทย, Deutsch, Italiano, Français, English, Español, ελληνικά, Português, Magyar, Polski, العربية, Türk.<br>* Optimized for: ARMv7 + VFP, ARMv7 + NEON, x86 + SSE2.</p><p>NOTE:</p><p>It is time limited (5 days) evaluation version. If you like Neutron you could buy it here: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.neutroncode.mp</p><p>SUPPORT:</p><p>Neutron is under active development. Technical support e-mail: neutronmp@gmail.com. Forum: http://neutronmp.com/forum.</p><p>BUGS:</p><p>Please report bugs by e-mail or through the forum. Your patience, help and participation are highly appreciated!</p><p>NOTES:</p><p>- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: to work with database in /Android/data/com.neutroncode.mp folder.<br>- READ_PHONE_STATE: to control playback when phone state changes.<br>- GET_ACCOUNTS: to generate unique hardware/account key for the Neutron's license server (obtained information is deleted from the server completely after 1 month).<br>- INTERNET: to support audio streaming over the Internet.<br>- WRITE_SETTINGS: to support ringtone change from Neutron.</p><p>* DLNA® is trademark of the Digital Living Network Onkyo HF Player  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Onkyo+Corporation" title="Onkyo Corporation">Onkyo Corporation</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.onkyo.jp.musicplayer"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" class="description">  在Onkyo設備上實現對音樂更好的聲音控制，HF Player內置觸控式線性FIR等化器，提供16,384個獨立頻點進行精確均衡，而不會對聲音品質產生任何不良影響。您可以創建並保存個性化均衡預設，也能夠選擇經由專業音樂家優化的均衡預設。HF Player Android版能夠播放Hi-Res音訊，格式包括FLAC、192kHz 24-bit WAV以及DSD，無需額外收費。<p>數碼輸出<br>購買Onkyo DAC-HA200 手提DAC耳筒放大器可隨時隨地享受超出期望的聲音效果，通過USB線即可以數碼方式連接相容AOA 2.0的Andriod裝置。購買解鎖應用程式並升級為全功能開放的HF Player還能夠通過OTG線與相容USB音訊的外部裝置以數碼方式進行連接，以及輸出Hi-Res音訊。<br>請注意：通過耳機、AOS連接、OTG線數碼連接（僅限免費版本）時，採樣率高於88.2kHz的音訊將被降低取樣速率至44.2kHz進行播放。</p><p>功能特性<br>• 高精確度均衡器（16,384個頻點，線性FIR濾波器）<br>• 自動升頻功能<br>• 交叉淡化初換選項<br>• 支援唱片封面及歌詞顯示<br>• 重複播放功能（列表内曲目）<br>• 隨機播放功能（列表内曲目）<br>• 可選擇由音樂家優化、針對Onkyo耳機的均衡預設<br>• 簡易地將曲目新增到播放列表中<br>• 實時DSD轉換功能（付費版本支援此功能）<br>• 可通過Andriod裝置上的音量按鍵來控制外部USB音訊設備的音量調整功能</p><p>支援格式<br>• MP3, ALAC (採樣率高達48 kHz)<br>• DSF/DSD-IFF (2.8 MHz / 5.6 MHz / 11.2 MHz, DoP / PCM 轉換<br>• FLAC/ALAC/WAV/AIFF(採樣率高達384 kHz), Ogg-Vorbis (採樣率高達192 kHz)<br>請注意：採樣率超過88.2kHz的音訊在播放時將降低取樣速率至44.1kHz或48kHz。</p><p>支援語言<br>英語，法語，德語，日語，簡體中文，繁體中文</p><p>系统需求<br>Android 4.1或更新版本。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a “音樂的音樂！”在您的手機的使用將發揮重要的作用。<p>音樂播放器是完全免費的開源播放器。這是一個音樂內置2.3支持Android1.6及更高版本的應用程序。</p><p>免費音樂播放器的設計與容易和先進的聽者心中。易於使用的界面允許您瀏覽到你想要的音樂，聽到快不陷入細節和額外的按鈕。<br>此外，先進的選項，給你一個機會，創造自己的音樂聆聽體驗快速播放列表編輯以及一個動態的均衡。</p><p><br>主要特點：<br>- 從文件夾播放歌曲，並從自己的圖書館<br>- 建立快速播放列表<br>- 動態隊列<br>- 嵌入和獨立。CUE文件支持<br>- 1個可配置的部件類型<br>- scrobbling<br>- 標籤編輯器<br>- 快圖書館掃描<br>- 高層次的定制，通過設置<br>- 設定你喜歡的音樂作為鈴聲。</p><p>免責聲明：<br>- Looper  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=RubberBigPepper" title="RubberBigPepper">RubberBigPepper</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="rubberbigpepper.Looper"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFnJ1YmJlcmJpZ3BlcHBlci5Mb29wZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This is a simple drum machine for beatboxers. <br>Beatboxers! It is finished! Now you can create music from the loop entries on your phone, the main thing that it was based on the Android OS. You do not need to buy Korg Kaoss Pad 3 =) The application is called Looper, it has the ability to record six tracks in length from 1 to 32 beats, you can also choose the speed of the metronome, you can combine multiple tracks into one. Delete track that you do not like, and in its place, create a new one! Be creative, create, and once more to create! And then let's listen to friends, app can save your creativity in a format mp3. Unlike Korg Kaoss Pad 3, the application is not able to add sound effects, but this is only the first version of the program.<br>Features:<br>-record and playback up to 6 tracks, if not sufficient, then drag'n'drop one track to another, they will merge into one<br>-record from microphone and simultaneous playback of other tracks (only when using a wired headset)<br>-selecting the number of bits <div class="description">  最好的節拍器和調諧器是其中包含了兩個可靠的設備一個特殊的音樂應用程序。在玩吉他這將是有益的。<p>•節拍器提供各種節奏模式，其參數以直觀的方式被改變。整個輔以一個龐大而清晰的界面。</p><p>產品特點：</p><p>♫節奏從20到240的BPM調整<br>♫敲擊速度<br>♫保存歌曲<br>♫可調節奏簽名簡單，複合和複雜米。<br>♫從2到每小節20次<br>♫節拍細分為季度，第八，三重，十六，五重和六重音符<br>♫吧台<br>♫4聲音包<br>♫自動關閉，當有來電<br>♫在後台運行<br>♫自動保存設置退出</p><p><br>•調諧器是一個應用程序非常適合業餘愛好者和專業音樂家。您可以選擇一個從三種模式：<br>♫自動 - 自動調諧 - 信號的已審查的頻率被解釋為純音的特定的頻率的下一個清晰的聲音（在-50℃至+50分的範圍內），<br>♫聲音 - 調整 - 選擇要調整的特定聲音<br>♫PLAY - 基於所述特定頻率的聲音。</p><p>屏幕上的按鈕用於演奏吉他琴弦的個人聲音和鋼琴中間的“A”的聲音。設置允許您指定的麥克風，基頻，並於440赫茲的頻率美分偏差的敏感度也有定義一個特定的倍頻和聲音的名稱的可能性。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a 當你感到寂寞的時候，當你騎著腳踏車，當你塞在捷運車廂裡，當你喝著下午茶滑著平板電腦看著電子書的時候….<br>其實你需要的是一點點符合那個場景的音樂…<br>偶然想聽點音樂的時候，打開音樂軟體，卻盯著螢幕發著呆，不知道最近出了什麼新歌，也不知道該聽些什麼…<br>MUX是個能符合你需求的正版音樂App，限時免費提供Android用戶下載聆聽。<p></p><p>．首創人性化音樂風格比例組合功能 (例:80%搖滾 20%古典)<br>適合工作中或閱讀中不想花時間選歌的使用者，只要按照自己喜歡的比例分配，就能隨意聽音樂，像是個Mix類型的音樂電台。</p><p></p><p>．歌曲暫存技術離線音樂不斷線，維護音樂聆聽品質<br>特製的音樂暫存技術，讓突然進入無網路狀態的用戶(捷運上，地下室停車場..)，不受到網路斷線的影響，仍能正常播放音樂聆聽，以歌單輪播取代音樂突然中止，維持用戶良好的音樂體驗。</p><p></p><p>．專輯推薦 &amp; 精選頻道，不定期更新及推薦最新專輯及頻道，讓用戶一鍵收聽，不用費心製作歌單。</p><p></p><p>．登入體驗 – 只要用Facebook即可登入使用，聽到不喜歡的歌曲可永久封鎖，喜歡的歌曲可以收藏製作個人歌單，系統將自動記錄你的歌曲喜愛習慣，篩選不適合用戶的音樂，人性化減少播放用戶不喜愛的音樂。</p><p></p><p>．正版授權我們付費– 13個鼓墊<br>我們即將釋放的吉他和鋼琴。<br>不要忘記點擊我們的Facebook頁面一樣！<br>https://www.facebook.com/drumkit.free<br>鼓樂器的打擊樂組的成員。在霍恩博斯特爾薩克斯分類系統，它是一個membranophone 。鼓的至少一個膜的一致性，被鼓皮或鼓皮，綜合類伸過來一個shell eith來襲，直接與玩家的手，或用鼓棒，產生音效。一般是感光鼓的底部，通常情況下調諧到稍低的間距不是最佳的鼓皮諧振頭。此技術已被用來引起鼓作出合理的，如拇指輥。鼓是世界上最古老和果汁無處不在的樂器，千百年來的基本設計已大致維持不變。<br>如鼓，定音鼓，所有類型的調整，以一定間距。通常情況下，一些鼓，定音鼓鼓以外的其他可以被安排在一起，創建一個鼓包。</p><p>Get the Drum Kit . It's free and very easy to use.<br>You can turn your android in a Professional Drumkit and you will be a drummers and percussionists!<br>Drums Kit fully supports all devices.<br>Make sure you turn up your Media Volume.</p><p>[Key Features]<br>- Multitouch<br>- very low latency<br>- Complete acoustic drum kit<br>- Realistic drums sounds<br>- High audio quality<br>- real drums set<br>- support for all screen resolutions<br>- Record mode<br>- Play in loop<br>- 13 drums pads<br>coming soon we release guitar and piano.<br>Don't forget to click Like on our Facebook page !<br>https://www.facebook.com/drumkit.free<br>The drum is a member of the percussion group of musical instruments. In the Hornbostel-Sachs classification system, it is a membranophone. Drums consist of at least one membrane, called a drumhead or drum skin, that is stretched over a shell and struck, either directly with the player's hands, or with a drum stick, to produce sound. There is usually a resonance head on the underside of the drum, typically tuned to a slightly lower pitch than the top drumhead. Other techniques have been used to cause drums to make sound, such as the thumb roll. Drums are the world's oldest and most ubiquitous musical instruments, and the basic design has remained virtually unchanged for thousands of years.<br>All types of drums, such as timpani for example, are tuned to a certain pitch. Often, several drums, other than timpani drums, can be arranged together to create a drum kit.</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=drumkit.freeapp" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=drumkit.freeapp" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 3.9 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 78.29866886138916%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="drumkit.freeapp"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGQoXEhUKD2RydW1raXQuZnJlZWFwcBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </span> </div> </div>   </div><div class="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-docid="com.UkuleleTuner.Think" data-original-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-short-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small"> <div class="card-content id-track-click id-track-impression" data-docid="com.UkuleleTuner.Think" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5Va3VsZWxlVHVuZXIuVGhpbmsQARgD" data-uitype="500">  <a class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5Va3VsZWxlVHVuZXIuVGhpbmsQARgD" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.UkuleleTuner.Think" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="Easy Ukulele - Frequency Sound Generator  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Jos%C3%A9+Morais" title="José Morais">José Morais</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.jm.android.frequencygenerator"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWNvbS5qbS5hbmRyb2lkLmZyZXF1ZW5jeWdlbmVyYXRvchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Things you can do with this tool:<br>- Speaker tests.<br>- Subwoofer tests.<br>- Bass test<br>- Audio amplifier tests.<br>- Equalizer fine tuning.<br>- Car audio tuning<br>- SPL competitions<br>- Music instrument tuning<br>- Frequency response analysis<br>- As a infrasound or ultrasound source<br>- Subwoofer crossover tuning<br>- Loudspeaker breakup<br>- Taking a hearing test (test your friends and family).<br>- Testing your new headphones (can they output 20Hz as specify in the box?)<br>- Sound Wiki: The app teaches the user the use and names of the various sound ranges.<br>- To create relaxation and meditation sounds.<br>- Some users use it because of tinnitus. This app can help you finding the tinnitus frequency.<br>- As a noise mask (pink and white noise)<p>Features:<br>- Solid, double precision, real time, accurate, wave generator  (64-bit precision IEEE 754 floating point engine)<br>- 16 bit PCM encoding (CD quality), PCM 32 bits floating-point format on Android Lollipop 5.0+ devices.<br>- Sampling rate at 44100 (CD quality) or 48000 Hz (automatic native DAC detection!)<br>- Tone generator<br>- Infrasounds generator<br>- Bass generator (low frequencies)<br>- High frequencies generator<br>- Ultrasound generator (only limited by your phone hardware)<br>- Function generator (sine and square waveform)<br>- Sweep tone generator (linear or logarithmic for musicians)<br>- Real time manual frequency increment or decrement (accurate, without pops and clicks)<br>- Real time Binaural Beats generator<br>- Sweep loops (continuous, with no lag, no clicks)<br>- Second low frequency oscillator LFO for amplitude modulation<br>- Time span selectable<br>- White noise generator<br>- Pink noise generator<br>- Runs in background<br>- Save favorite tones and sweeps in a list for future use (PRO version)<br>- Precise left/right channel volume control<br>- Possibility to invert one channel for cancellation effects.<br>- No ADS!<br>- No excessive PERMISSIONS !!<br>- PRO version option for the users that want to support the future development and maintenance of the app.</p><p>Download<br>This app in only available in the Google Play Store. If you are reading this on another site, do not download the app, it may be an old version, and is not authorized by me. Go to the Google Play please.</p><p>Permissions<br>- In-app purchases: this permission allows users that want to support the future development and maintenance of this app to upgrade to PRO VERSION, paying a small fee, and without installing a new separate version. This process is the new trend in phone apps. This is a one time purchase only.<br>- Internet access: This is used only by Google Analytics module, so i can better understand what features are being used.</p><p>Limitations<br>None.</p><p>Notes<br>24 KHz is only possible in phones with a 48KHz sample rate DAC. Some very expensive phones do not have such a DAC. This is a hardware limitation.</p><p>Copyright notice<br>This program and its content is copyright work. All rights reserved. href="/store/apps/details?id=com.singlecellsoftware.caustic" title="Caustic 3"> 433.    Caustic 3  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Single+Cell+Software" title="Single Cell Software">Single Cell Software</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.singlecellsoftware.caustic"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS5zaW5nbGVjZWxsc29mdHdhcmUuY2F1c3RpYxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Caustic 3 is a music creation tool inspired by rack-mount synthesizers / samplers rigs. <br>Everything is real-time and optimized for mobile devices.<br><br>Create your rack by adding up to 14 machines from a choice of:<br>* Subsynth - Virtual analog subtractive synthesizer<br>* PCMSynth - Multi-sample wave synthesizer <br>* BassLine - 303-like monosynth<br>* BeatBox - 8-channel sampling drum machine<br>* PadSynth - Harmonic table pad synthesizer<br>* 8BitSynth - 8bit equation solver synthesizer<br>* Modular - Fully configurable and routable synthesizer<br>* Organ - Hammond-like tonewheel organ with rotary speaker<br>* Vocoder - 8-band harmonic vocoder<br>* FMSynth - DX-style 3-operator fm synthesizer<br>* KSSynth - Karplus-Strong string modeling synth (new!)<br><br>The app also includes:<br>* Effects rack supporting 2 effects per machine. (16 effect types)<br>* Mixer desk with global Delay/Reverb effects<br>* Master section with parametric EQ and limiter<br>* Song sequencer<br><br>Supports automation on most controls and includes powerful editors for modifying recorded automation curves.<br><br>All files are stored on the user-accessible storage, and users can supply their own WAV files for use in the PCMSynth, BeatBox, and Vocoder.<br>Supports all uncompressed WAV files (8-16-24-32bit, any sampling rate).<br>The PCMSynth can also load SoundFont files (.sf2), SFZ and FL Studio mobile instruments (.instr, .ZIP)<br><p>Class-compliant USB MIDI controllers can be connected via USB OTG cable on devices running at least Android 3.2 and supporting USB host mode.<br></p><p>See the in-app help section for tutorial videos and full online manual.<br><br>Minimum device specs are:<br>* 1GHz ARMv7 processor<br>* 800 x 480 resolution screen<br>* Headphones or external speakers<br><br>This is a demo version of Caustic. There is no time limit in demo mode but save/export are disabled. The app will automatically save your current song between sessions.</p><p>Unlock the full version buy purchasing the "Caustic Unlock Key" (sold separate). The full version enables song saving as well as exporting to WAV, Ogg and MIDI.<br>http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.singlecellsoftware.caustickey<br><br>There is also a FREE (full version) PC version available for download on the product website.<br>Come visit http://www.singlecellsoftware.com to download more presets, request features, share your tracks and hear what others are creating with Caustic 3.<br><br></p><p>Permissions:<br>- Record Audio: The app supports recording your own samples.<br>- Storage read/write: All samples and songs are stored on your device and can be accessed via USB.<br>- Full network access: To launch the (optional) FTP server, nothing else.<br>- In-app billing: To restore purchases for those who bought during v1.0. There are no other purchases other than the unlock key app.</p><p><br>If you have any problems, write me via the developer email or visit http://www.singlecellsoftware.com<br>SingleCellSoftware is one href="/store/apps/details?id=com.alexandernaut.arpio" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.alexandernaut.arpio" title="ARPIO a new musical instrument"> 435.    ARPIO a new musical instrument  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Alexandernaut" title="Alexandernaut">Alexandernaut</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.alexandernaut.arpio"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2NvbS5hbGV4YW5kZXJuYXV0LmFycGlvEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ARPIO is a new musical instrument designed to play arpeggios*.  Move up-and-down the matrix to set the arpeggio's speed, or left-and-right to set its pitch. Tilt the device for accelerometer-controlled volume and pitchbend, or shake for vibrato.<p><br>You may be interested in ARPIO if you play piano, guitar, violin, drums, synthesizer, arpeggiators, cello, or bass.  Also, if you use digital audio workstations like Ableton Live, Bitwig Studio, Logic Pro, Fruity Loops, or Pro Tools. </p><p>In the future, MIDI support may be added depending on interest. This would turn ARPIO into a MIDI arpeggiator, allowing you to control hardware synthesizers like those made by Moog, Roland, Korg, Dave Smith Instruments, Elektron, Arturia, Yamaha, and others.</p><p><br>A similar version of ARPIO is available on iOS devices, under the name Arpeggionome. </p><p><br>*An arpeggio is a musical technique where notes in a chord are played in sequence, rather than ringing out simultaneously.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.alexandernaut.arpio" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.alexandernaut.arpio" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 3.9 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 78.32033157348633%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" (LITE)"> 459.    PitchLab Guitar Tuner (LITE)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=PitchLabApp" title="PitchLabApp">PitchLabApp</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.symbolic.pitchlab"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5zeW1ib2xpYy5waXRjaGxhYhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Hands-free tuning for guitar and other acoustic instruments.  Designed for novices and pros, fully featured, 100% free.<p>PitchLab PRO now available: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.musician.tuner</p><p>Unique features help you work out the chords to new tunes, visualize the pitch and consistency of the human voice, violin or other instrument, or answer the questions "what notes am I humming", "what are those chords", "am I hitting all the notes in tune", "is my vibrato consistent" etc. Select from a list of common instrument tunings or quickly create and manage your own using the built-in tuning editor.</p><p>Eight separate visualization modes:</p><p>1) Instrument: Combination radial strobe and string/note indicators for easy instrument tuning.  Includes a database of common tunings for Guitar, Violin/Fiddle, Mandolin, Ukulele, Banjo, Bouzouki and Pedal Steel, plus a built-in editor for up to 100 user-defined instrument tunings.</p><p>2) Dial &amp; Strobe: Combination dial tuner and innovative linear strobe for rapid and extremely accurate hands-free instrument tuning (this linear strobe is a genuine implementation of the strobe-tuner concept, not a decorative imitation).</p><p>3) Chromatic Dials: 12-way simultaneous display, with a separate dial tuner for each of the 12 notes in the chromatic scale, to visualize multiple voiced notes or chords.</p><p>4) Chromatic Tiles: 12-way simultaneous display of the notes in the chromatic scale, optimized for the visualization of rapid note/pitch changes (e.g. vibrato, arpeggio, portamento, glissando etc).</p><p>5) Spectrogram: Scrolling display of live sound analysis, showing the polyphonic perceived pitch of a wide range of sound types (including human voices and singing).</p><p>6) Chords: Grid-based estimation display of common chord types (maj/min, maj7/min7, dom7/dim7), ideal for quickly determining the 'strum along' chords for a tune where the chords are reasonably clear.</p><p>7) Partials: A multi-way strobe and waveform display, showing individual note partials along with full note timbre for detailed analysis of sound characteristics.</p><p>8) BigStrobe: A large, single strobe display, optimized for small screen devices.</p><p>These visualization modes are easily accessed by swiping the screen left/right or by pressing &amp; holding the tuner display to get a pop-up view selection menu.  User-selectable options are accessed via the MENU button or the pop-up view selection menu and include support for custom temperaments.</p><p>Please rate or review, check for updates regularly and email pitchlabapp@gmail.com to report issues for quick resolution.</p><p>Example instrument tunings:</p><p>Guitar, Standard<br>Guitar, Drop D<br>Guitar, Open D<br>Guitar, Open G<br>Guitar, Open A<br>Guitar, Lute<br>Guitar, Irish</p><p>Bass Guitar, (4 String), Standard<br>Bass Guitar, (5 String), Low B<br>Bass Guitar, (5 String), Low E<br>Bass Guitar, (6 String), Standard</p><p>Violin: Standard, Tenor</p><p>Viola: Standard<br>			<br>Fiddle: Standard, Cajun, Open G, Sawmill, Gee-dad, Open D, High bass, Cross tuning, Calico</p><p>Mandolin: Standard, Octave</p><p>Ukulele: Standard, D6/Soprano, Tenor, Baritone, Bass</p><p>Banjo (5 string): Standard/Open G, C tuning, Double C, Sawmill, Open D, Guitar, Willie Moore, Dock Boggs (Low C), Dock Boggs (Low D), Cumberland Gap, G Minor, Open C</p><p>Banjo: Plectrum, Tenor Standard, Tenor Irish, Long neck</p><p>Bouzouki: 8 string, 6 string</p><p>Pedal Steel: Standard/E9th, C6th, A7th, C Diatonic</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span The app is also a music looper as well - you can slow down song speed and loop sections of the music for easy practice. <br> <br>You can also save the adjusted audio to an .aac audio file for sharing with friends or listening in another player. <br> <br>Music Speed Changer is great for musicians practicing an instrument needing to slow down the tempo, speeding up audio books for faster listening, making nightcore or just rocking out to your favorite song at 130%.<br>  <br>Notice for Google Play Music users: Google places DRM on songs purchased through Google Play Music. Your songs purchased in that app will not be visible in Music Speed Changer (or any other music player). A simple way around this is to download the purchased songs through the Google Play Music desktop browser app, then transfer the downloaded .mp3 file to your Android device.<br> <br>If you have any over.<br>-Great for making Nightcore.<br>-Open audio files from your device's storage, or from the cloud.<br>-Export your adjustments to an .aac file for sharing or playing in another music player.<br>-Modern material design UI and simple to use.<br>-Completely free and no restrictions on this music speed controller.<br>-No waiting for your local audio file to decode, instant playback and instant audio speed and pitch adjustment. slow down audio speed or change music pitch instantly.<br>-Does not waste space storing huge uncompressed audio files on your device.<br>-Plays all audio 立式鋼琴，現代數碼鋼琴和電鋼琴。使用這些鋼琴作品，輕鬆的音樂或壓力緩解鈴聲！</p><p>下面，你會發現不同鋼琴，用來播放古典音樂，爵士音樂和現代流行音樂鋼琴和弦。</p><p>鋼琴</p><p>大鋼琴是最知名的模型; 古典鋼琴幀保持水平延伸距離鋼琴鍵盤的字符串。有多種尺寸的三角鋼琴，1，5米到3米長，全尺寸應該給最好的音質，通常用於音樂會鋼琴作品和古典鋼琴音樂。</p><p>立式鋼琴</p><p>立式鋼琴琴弦立式放置在前面鋼琴鍵盤更緊湊，這就是為什麼它也被稱為立式鋼琴。在許多情況下，限制建設的長度鋼琴弦立式鋼琴，但也有長的字符串模式稱為直立三角鋼琴。</p><p>數碼鋼琴</p><p>數碼鋼琴在許多方面是一個更加舒適和實用的替代品古典鋼琴，但在其他許多情況下一樣與數字樂器，數碼鋼琴，玩的感覺不能取代你的經驗當你與真正的字符串彈鋼琴。</p><p>電子琴</p><p>電子鋼琴未分類電子儀器的組中，類似於電吉他的聲音拾取並轉換為數字鋼琴曲。電子鋼琴爵士鋼琴音樂在1900年的中間走紅。</p><p>歷史的鋼琴一直是較昂貴的樂器，它的膨脹，購買和學習如何彈鋼琴。現代技術使更多的觀眾可供選擇，你可以找到免費鋼琴樂譜和網上虛擬鋼琴。虛擬鋼琴鍵盤即使無法比擬的真正的鋼琴鍵盤，鋼琴教程在線鋼琴課可以幫助您開發鋼琴家。即使鋼琴遊戲，網上玩鋼琴會給你的做法如何彈鋼琴。</p><p>這個程序包括僅適用於鋼琴音樂mp3手機鈴聲安卓。</p><p>鋼琴鈴聲特點：</p><p>- 設置為鈴聲安卓/接觸鋼琴的鈴聲/報警聲音/短信鈴聲設置為來電鈴聲<br>- 設置定時器來播放聲音<br>- 設置小部件主屏幕上的按鈕最喜愛的聲音</p><p>法律信息：</p><p>鋼琴音樂鈴聲免費下載的應用程序中使用的聲音是在公共領域許可證和/或風景的許可證。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span href="/store/apps/details?id=com.remind4u2.birds.sounds.relax.and.sleep" title="鳥呼叫的聲音"> 467.    鳥呼叫的聲音  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=remind4u2" title="remind4u2">remind4u2</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.remind4u2.birds.sounds.relax.and.sleep"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaNAoyEjAKKmNvbS5yZW1pbmQ0dTIuYmlyZHMuc291bmRzLnJlbGF4LmFuZC5zbGVlcBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  將鳥的歌曲作為鈴聲，報警或短信通知。最佳自然鳥類的應用程序的聲音！幫助你放鬆經過艱苦的一天！<p>同林鳥，潛鳥，森林的氛圍，海鷗，只知更鳥，歌鳥，烏鴉，貓頭鷹，夜鷹，啄木鳥，鳥在林</p><p>+放鬆鈴聲<br>+自然音樂<br>+舒緩的音樂 - 睡眠的聲音<br>+絕對放鬆</p><p>鳥發聲包括鳥鳴聲和鳥兒的歌唱。在非技術的使用，鳥兒的歌唱的鳥被人耳聽到悠揚的聲音，是的。在鳥類和觀鳥，（比較複雜）的歌曲來區分（比較簡單）調用的函數。</p><p>Biomusic是創建或執行非人類的聲音，其中涉及的實驗音樂的一種形式。該定義也有時擴展到包括人類在一個直接的生物的方式所作的聲音。比如，也可以被稱為由腦電波的作曲家創建的音樂biomusic創建的對人體無工具或儀器的使用不屬於所述主體（唱歌或發聲的音樂可以從這個通常是排除定義）。<br>biomusic可分為兩個基本類別：音樂，僅由合成的動物（或在某些情況下，工廠），和音樂這是基於合成的動物的聲音，但由一個人的作曲家佈置創建。某些形式的音樂使用部分的音樂錄製的聲音的性質，例如使用自然的聲音作為背景音樂的音景，環境音樂有時使用自然聲音修改混響，延遲單元的斯派西版本的新世紀音樂天籟的氛圍。</p><p>人們用自然的聲音，放鬆的技巧，是由於以下原因，其中包括：<br>憤怒管理（衝浪轟鳴聲，大海，水流，海浪在沙灘上的聲音，海洋，雨的聲音）<br>心臟健康（熱帶雨林的聲音，鳥兒的歌唱）<br>抑鬱症的治療（鳥的聲音，瑜伽音樂，白噪聲的應用程序）<br>睡前歌曲和睡前的聲音<br>總體幸福感（在海灘上的波浪，叢林聲音）<br>頭痛治療（鳥叫聲，海浪的聲音）<br>血壓高（衝浪，瀑布轟鳴的聲音，白噪聲）<br>免疫系統的支持（聲音的小溪，小溪，流讓，河，白噪聲）<br>失眠的治療（所有的水聲，雨的聲音，睡眠的聲音，聲音的黑暗）<br>疼痛管理（所有鳥類的歌曲，所有的水聲）<br>壓力管理（聲音，暴風雨，閃電，雷聲大，雨點的聲音，白噪聲精簡版）</p><p>狗哨，鳥鳴，動物的聲音，貓口哨，驅蚊劑，白噪聲，雨</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> app"> 481.    Party Mixer - DJ player app  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Prizmos+Ltd" title="Prizmos Ltd">Prizmos Ltd</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.punsoftware.mixer"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5wdW5zb2Z0d2FyZS5taXhlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Party Mixer lets you to play two tracks at the same time and cross-fade between them like a DJ, including change their pitch &amp; tempo to mix them seamlessly. You can also create, save, and load playlists, and use an “Auto DJ” mode that mixes songs automatically for you.<p>No DJ-ing experience necessary. Party Mixer has been designed to be an easy-to-use app that anyone can pick up and play with. It features a very simple interface: just create a playlist, then drag-and-drop tracks onto the player decks. You can crossfade between the two tracks using the horizontal slider at the bottom. Change the tempo and pitch using the vertical sliders. That's it!</p><p>Features:<br>- Play 2 tracks simultaneously and cross-fade between them<br>- Change tempo/pitch/BPM (free on left deck, paid on right deck)<br>- Create/open/edit playlists<br>- Seek within track, show elapsed and remaining time<br>- Search in playlist<br>- Access all music stored on your device</p><p>Want other features? Vote for what we should work on next on our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/partymixerapp</p><p>Device compatibility:<br>- Compatible with all phones and tablets running Android 2.3 or newer<br>- Tempo/pitch control is not supported by some devices<br>- Compatible file formats are: mp3, mp4, m4a, 3gp, ogg, mid, wav, and since Android 3.1, also flac and aac</p><p>NOTE: If you run into problems with Auto DJ turning itself off automatically, please go to menu -&gt; Settings and check "Use old playback implementation". Then stop all playback and back out of the app completely and relaunch it. Note that this will disable pitch control. We're working on a fix, but in the mean time, you can use this solution if you have problems with Auto DJ.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=CATSNU" title="CATSNU">CATSNU</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.scpark.korinst2"> <div class="pon" </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  국악(Gugak)은 한국의 전통 악기를 스마트 폰에서 연주할 수 있는 모바일 앱입니다. 한국 음악의 전통적 연주 기법, 조현기능 등과 악기와 관련된 정보를 제공하여 리얼한 사운드로 여러분들에게 한국 음악의 즐거움과 정취를 느끼게해 줄 것입니다. <p>악기 설명 <br>가야금은 한국의 대표적인 현악기입니다. 『삼국사기』에 의하면 가실왕이 당나라의 악기를 보고 가야금을 만들었다고 전해집니다. 가야국이 어지러워지자 우륵은 신라로 망명하여 제자들에게 가야금의 악곡과 춤, 노래를 가르쳤고, 통일 신라 시대, 고려, 조선조를 거쳐 오늘날까지 전승되고 있습니다. 가야금에는 정악을 연주하기 위한 정악 가야금과 민속악 및 산조를 연주하기 위한 산조 가야금이 있습니다. </p><p>산조 가야금 <br>산조가야금은 19세기 후반 산조라는 새로운 음악 갈래를 연주하기 위해 만들어졌습니다. 농현으로 감성을 표출하고, 기교적인 빠른 연속음이 출현하는 산조를 연주하기 위한 산조 가야금은 정악 가야금과 차이가 있습니다. 공명통의 크기가 축소되었으며, 그 모양도 거문고처럼 상자식으로 변화했습니다. 정악 가야금과 달리 양이두 대신 봉미에 현을 겁니다. </p><p>개발:<br>서울대학교 음악대학 예술과학센터(www.catsnu.com)</p><p>개발자: <br>강효지, 고병량, 고병오, 김대현, 김미정, 김영선, 김태은, 김혜연, 남상봉, 문지성, 박수철, 박재록, 방정호, 서윤정, 송향숙, 안준석, 유리나, 耳機控制為您的 JAYS Android 遠端耳塞帶來了一系列新功能。變更音軌、調整音量、定位具體媒體播放程式、啟動應用程式以及更多。JAYS 耳機控制带有三种模式；<br>關閉模式、簡單模式及高級模式，均可由唯一的導覽滾輪輕鬆控制，均針對 JAYS 产品 a-JAYS Five for Android 與 a-JAYS One+ 進行了最佳化。</p><p>簡單模式<br>- smartChord calculates, shows and plays much more than 1.000.000.000 chords and fingerings: for different instruments, for predefined tunings, for custom tunings, from 3 to 8 strings, from the first to the last fret, for beginners and experts, with capo, for right- or left-handed users, ... and (hopefully:) fulfills all your wishes. <br>smartChord provides you also a reverse chord finder, scales, arpeggios, a chromatic tuner, metronome, pitch pipe, ear training quiz, transposing slide ruler, playground, tone generator, timer, flashlight and as a new feature: Circle of Fifth:-)<p>It's worth a Promised!!!</p><p>Ultimate chord reference:<br>* Dictionary with &gt; 220 types of chords<br>* Expansion each chord to a 'slash chord'<br>* Support of guitar, bass, banjo, balalaika, bouzouki, cavaquinho, mandocello, mandolin and ukulele with specific settings for each of them<br>* Choice between more than 200 predefined tunings (e.g. DADGAD or mandola)<br>* Define an individual custom tuning for each instrument<br>* Calculate all the possibilities for playing a chord and the fingering<br>* Supports a capo<br>* Supports instruments with shortened strings (e.g. 5 string Banjo)<br>* Browser/explorer for comfortable navigation<br>* Modes for different playing strength (basic, advanced, expert)<br>* Individual adjustment for almost everything. The sound can be chosen. FLAC 。<br>★速度和间距可以在任何时刻改变。<br>★ 2种模式改变节奏和音高 - 滑块（快） /垫（准确） 。</p><p>用法：<br>为了起到修饰轨道只需点击“选择”按钮，并从曲库或通过浏览器选择的轨道。</p><p>支持格式： wav/mp3/ogg/flac 。</p><p>如果您选择。 wav文件，然后音乐可以立即播放。对于其他音频格式的声音必须被优化的演奏（通常需要几秒钟，正常长度的赛道上新的和快速的设备）编制。它不会改变原始文件。</p><p>应用程序需要为您的设备上的未压缩音轨的临时空间。对于标准的3分钟长的轨道大约是20MB ，更长更多，更短的少。通常你不必担心这一点。</p><p>如果你想有更多的乐趣，你可以改变节奏或音乐曲目的音调。<br>“相对速度”介绍如何快速的声音将会播放， 1.00是原来的/不改变节奏， 0.5的2倍速度较慢， 2.0快2倍。范围是： 0.25 .. 4.0。<br>“音高八度改变”描述了如何间距将改为与探源表示为-1.00 .. +1.00个八度， 0.00是原来的/不改变音高。<br>这些值可以通过滑块或通过点击按钮在他们附近，并设置正确的价值进行调整。</p><p>你也可以保存你的音乐转换成文件。<br>支持的格式导出/保存： WAV / OGG / FLAC 。<br>对于OGG格式的编码可能是长期的任务。</p><p>请注意，大部分操作都是CPU密集型和良好的效果你需要一个performat设备。</p><p>注意事项：<br>节奏与音高值是自动保存的。当您选择新的轨道将这些值设置为默认值。</p><p>更多技术信息：<br>支持流格式： 8/16位编码，1/ 2通道，一万一千零二十五分之八千/二万二千零五十分之一万六/四万八分之四万四千一百Hz采样率。用过的采样速率必须由设备得到支持， 8位编码被扩展到16位编码，以便设备具有支持16位。<br>OGG编码器只支持采样率44100赫兹。</p><p>权限：<br>✓ App将使用权限写入SD卡上，使出口的轨道。<br>如“互联网” href="/store/apps/details?id=com.amapps.mobile.musicplayer" title="音樂播放器"> 518.    音樂播放器  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=am+application" title="am application">am application</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.amapps.mobile.musicplayer"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS5hbWFwcHMubW9iaWxlLm11c2ljcGxheWVyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  您可以輕鬆地管理您的音樂，音樂播放器將引導您輕鬆找到所有的音樂在您的手機上。<br>該音樂播放器不僅是基於藝術家或專輯，但也是基於文件夾結構。超過3桌面小工具讓你的音樂播放從來沒有這麼容易。<br>更多的背景皮膚讓你的音樂播放器顯得更加突出，而這些也讓你的音樂播放器，獲得一個新的水平經驗。<br>獨特的均衡器讓你的音樂聽起來就像你從未有過的。<br>支持格式：<br>MP3，MP2，MP1，OGG，WAV，AIFF，MIDI，AAC，AAC，3GP，XM，IT，S3M，MOD，MTM，UMX，MO3，MP4，M4A，OTA<br>- 更多頻段用於所有支持的格式，預設，自定義預設優化的圖形化均衡器<br>- 獨立強大的低音和高音調節<br>- 立體聲擴展，單聲道混合，平衡<br>- 交叉淡入淡出<br>- 無縫<br>- 回放增益<br>- 從文件夾中，並從自己的庫中的歌曲播放<br>- 動態隊列<br>- 耳機支持，在耳機和/或BT連接，自動恢復（可在設置中禁用）<br>- 歌曲記錄<br>- 標籤編輯器<br>- 快庫掃描<br>- 通過設置高級別定制 <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.amapps.mobile.musicplayer" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div> data-docid="com.kober.headset" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWNvbS5rb2Jlci5oZWFkc2V0EAEYAw==" data-uitype="500">  <a class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWNvbS5rb2Jlci5oZWFkc2V0EAEYAw==" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.kober.headset" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div data-cover-large="https://lh5.ggpht.com/I3j2Yjnu-Dg0xPZbU26q574TyT50imQCwb-4ZQXZR8b6JFly-4QSIKu7VmgP299j0ESq=w340-rw" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.kober.headset" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.kober.headset" title="Headset Button ControllerTrial"> 519.    Headset Button ControllerTrial  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Christoph+Kober" title="Christoph Kober">Christoph Kober</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.kober.headset"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWNvbS5rb2Jlci5oZWFkc2V0EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  透過線控按鍵來遙控你的音樂播放器 - 還有更多玩法!<p>Headset Button Controller擁有豐富的配置設定，讓你只需要按線控按鍵，就可以遙控手持設備進行播放音樂、切換曲目、調整音量、接聽來電、啟動語音命令等等更多捷徑操作。</p><p>Headset Button Controller預設了完整的按鍵捷徑操作，當然也可以個別自訂修改設定。依照你的喜好設定完成後，程式將以背景執行，幾乎不佔用CPU。我們使用單鍵式與相容Android系統的三鍵式線控耳機，來測試眾多型號品牌的Android手持設備與音樂播放器，絕大多數程式都可以正常執行捷徑控制操作。</p><p><br>單鍵式線控耳機 (三鍵式線控耳機的中鍵)的程式預設捷徑配置 :<br>* 單擊: 播放/暫停 (+ 接聽來電/結束通話)<br>* 雙擊: 下一首 (+ 拒接來電 / 麥克風靜音)<br>* 三擊: 上一首<br>* 四擊: 上一首 (2x)<br>* 長按: 音量控制 [2]<br>* 單擊後按住: 快轉 [3]<br>* 雙擊後按住: 倒帶 [3]<br>* 三擊後按住: 未設定</p><p>下列所有設定可彈性配置:<br>* 停止播放<br>* 播放/暫停<br>* 下一首<br>* 上一首<br>* 上一首 (2x)<br>* 靜音 / 取消靜音<br>* 語音命令<br>* 語音搜尋<br>* 重撥上一次通話號碼<br>* 語音報時 (需要安裝Text-To-Speech文字轉語音套件)<br>* 啟動程式<br>* 啟動捷徑<br>* 程序管理器 [1]<br>* 切換情境</p><p>長按按鍵可設定下列捷徑操作:<br>* 音量控制 [2]<br>* 倒帶 [3]<br>* 快轉 [3]</p><p>[1] 需要安裝 'Tasker'<br>[2] 按住按鍵不放時，音量會先回到設定的下限，然後逐漸提高直到放開按鍵。<br>[3] 並非所有的音樂播放器都支援 倒帶/快轉</p><p>使用三鍵式線控耳機時，左、右鍵可用來控制音量。</p><p><br>指定音樂播放器<br>Headset Button Controller通常會控制目前正在執行的音樂播放器。當然你也可以從已安裝音樂播放器來進行指定控制項目。</p><p>音量控制功能<br>當拔掉耳機時，Headset Button Controller會記憶播放音量，當再次連接耳機時會自動調整恢復音量。<br>* 最低音量下限: 起始音量大小依照'音量控制'命令設定<br>* 最高音量上限: 確保耳機音量不會超過此設定上限</p><p>通話功能<br>可以使用線控按鍵來控制通話:<br>* 單擊 接聽來電/結束通話(可配置)<br>* 雙擊 拒接來電/麥克風靜音 (可配置)<br>* 調整通話音量(參考音量控制)<br>* 語音播放來電者姓名 (需要安裝Text-To-Speech文字轉語音套件)<br>你也可以讓Headset Button Controller在設定的延遲時間後自動接聽來電。</p><p>連接/移除 耳機<br>你可以配置當手持設備連接/移除耳機時要執行的操作設定。</p><p>情境<br>你可以新增不同的'情境配置'設定，來配合你的使用需求。在首頁畫面上放置小工具或捷徑，協助你更快切換情境。也可以透過'Tasker'或'Locale' (Locale plug-in)程式來切換情境。所有設定都可以備份到記憶卡上。</p><p><br>===============<br>這是Headset Button Controller試用版。付費購買前請先安裝試用版本，確保你的手持設備跟音樂播放器可以使用。<br>===============</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=douduo+ye" title="douduo ye">douduo ye</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" 胎教音乐100首必听汇集了受到万千准妈妈推崇的热门胎教音乐。经产科医师和相关研究者强力推荐，胎教音乐主要是以音波刺激胎儿听觉器官的神经功能，有助于刺激胎儿的脑部成长。孕8个月后反复播送一首固定的乐曲，可为出生后的孩子培养音乐爱好，并为培养孩子的想象力打下基础。<p>胎教音乐100首必听须知<br>1、胎教音乐适宜收听频率为每日1次～2次，每次20分钟左右，选择在胎儿有胎动时进行为佳。<br>2、尽量选择在晚上临睡前或午休前比较合适，音乐应距离孕妇1米左右，音响强度在65分贝～70分贝为度。<br>3、可以选择那些安静、悠扬有利于冥想的曲目。避免那些声音嘈杂、节奏太快的音乐。</p> href="/store/apps/details?id=com.multimediastar.bassbooster" title="低音助推器"> 534.    低音助推器  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Multimedia+star" title="Multimedia star">Multimedia star</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.multimediastar.bassbooster"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS5tdWx0aW1lZGlhc3Rhci5iYXNzYm9vc3RlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  低音助推器將讓你的Android前所未有的聆聽體驗。使用這個低音放大器，你將能夠體驗流暢，增強的低音一個按鈕，只需點擊一下鼠標。有沒有無用的均衡器，低音增強通過使用特製的圓形升壓控制。注意：你必須使用耳機或外部揚聲器通知增強的低音。您的手機揚聲器可能將無法應付大量的低音放大。除了從低音增強功能，你還可以享受更大的音量。<p><br>特點：</p><p>✓簡單的低音助推器<br>✓平板電腦友好的佈局<br>✓不均衡 - 沒有麻煩與自定義預設<br>✓在後台運行 - 關閉應用程序仍然享受apmlified的的低音<br>✓體積助推器<br>✓媒體容積控制</p><p><br>如何使用：</p><p>首先，用你最喜愛的音樂播放器，打開音樂（它甚至可以是一個YouTube視頻或網絡收音機）。現在，進入這個自由低音助推器的應用程序，使用滾輪設置所需的低音增強級別和享受！要禁用低音增強，只是設置為零的車輪上的值。如果有其他的低音增強應用程序或體積放大器運行，你可能要禁用這個低音助推器的最佳效果，同去的均衡器。享受低音功放使用後，請點擊谷歌+1按鈕和速率的應用程序很好！</p><p>記住不以最大音量聽音樂的時間過長，因為它可能會傷害你的耳朵！ ，如果你真的很喜歡有一個EQ，那麼敬請關注，我會做一個！</p><p>如果您有任何建議，關於如何提高這種自由低音助推器，那麼請不要猶豫與我聯繫。</p><p>位置權限是廣告定位。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" 愛聽古典音樂的小孩不會變壞。經研究指出，從小培養孩子聆聽古典音樂的習慣，有助於孩子成長思維，增強推理，提升創造力及人文素養，對孩子未來成長有著意想不到的幫助。<br><p>本軟體精選30餘首最適合孩子們聆聽的古典樂曲，以歡樂的、幽默的、活潑的、優美的迷人樂曲吸引孩子們的目光，激發孩子們的學習興趣，並能夠創造父母與孩子間的親子互動，是讓孩子們進入古典音樂世界的最佳入門選擇，期望每一位父母都能夠成為孩子的音樂啟蒙老師！</p><p>本軟體適合0-14歲的兒童使用(含胎教、新生兒、嬰兒、幼兒、孩童)，對於古典音樂有興趣的青少年及成年人亦為入門首選。</p><p>全民好聲音之兒童古典音樂(鈴聲)<br>Everybody's Sound : Classical Music For Kids ( Ringtones )</p><p>【特色】<br>◆完全免費。<br>◆一鍵播放，操作簡易。<br>◆可離線使用。<br>◆收錄30餘首最適合孩子們聆聽的古典樂曲。<br>◆每首樂曲皆有其創作背景或出處之簡易說明。<br>◆每首音樂皆能獨立設置定時播放、重播次數、重播間隔及播放音量等，可依需求彈性設定。<br>◆每首樂曲皆能設置為裝置鈴聲、通知聲及鬧鈴聲。<br>◆可將喜歡的音樂加入我的最愛，並能任意排列位置。<br>◆可選擇裝置內的任意音檔進行播放。<br>◆可依序或隨機播放自選或全部樂曲。<br>◆支援多國語言：繁體中文、簡體中文、日文、英文(須變更裝置語言並重新安裝)。<br>◆可另存音檔至SD Card(方便分享於Line、WeChat、Facebook、Skype、WhatsApp等)<br></p><p>注：播放時連接高功率揚聲器效果更佳。</p><p>【收錄的音樂】<br>口哨與小狗<br>致愛麗斯<br>時鐘店<br>小狗圓舞曲<br>小貓圓舞曲<br>小牧童<br>巡邏兵進行曲<br>馬刀舞曲<br>玩具兵進行曲<br>快樂的雪橇<br>打字機<br>雛雞在蛋殼中的芭蕾<br>侏儒<br>窮富猶太人<br>雞腳上的小屋<br>古城<br>杜樂利花園<br>郵遞馬車<br>野蜂飛舞<br>終曲<br>母雞與公雞<br>水族館<br>大象<br>化石<br>快樂的農夫<br>維也納氣質圓舞曲<br>糖梅仙子之舞<br>花之圓舞曲<br>四季-春
